# 笨办法学C

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/benbanfa-xue-c
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/benbanfa-xue-c
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install benbanfa-xue-c
benbanfa-xue-c <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g benbanfa-xue-c
benbanfa-xue-c <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
